external_games.name: Train Simulator: Munich - Rosenheim Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Munich - Rosenheim Route Add-On
summary: The Munich to Rosenheim route through Germany serves as one of the most important cross-border lines to Austria, and this beautifully scenic route is now available for Train Simulator.Built between 1860 and 1871, initially as a single-track route into Austria from Germany, the line was increased to two tracks and formed the main line...
